sections.description:
Do you manage a website with multiple users performing admin tasks? Are you struggling to track user activity on your WordPress dashboard? Does your site use WooCommerce, and you’re finding it hard to respond to customer queries promptly? Do you have a plugin but constantly need to check the support forum for new issues? Would you like to enhance your site‚Äôs security and receive notifications directly on your mobile via Slack, even when you’re offline?

No need to worry anymore! With the ‚ÄúWP Activity Notifier‚Äù Plugin, you can easily track all user activities on your WordPress admin panel and stay updated on support forum activity, whether you‚Äôre online or not.

Introducing the #1 activity tracking and notification plugin for WordPress. This tool streamlines your WordPress experience, improves site security, and monitors hidden user activity by maintaining a detailed log of all user and system changes.

With its live monitoring dashboard, this powerful tool helps you stay on top of user actions, ensuring your site remains secure. It also adds an extra layer of protection while allowing you to provide better support without constantly checking forums.

Boost your WooCommerce experience with instant Slack notifications for stock updates, order statuses, sales, comments, coupon usage, billing and shipping details, new orders, product downloads, and much more. The plugin helps you log all changes and actions on your WordPress site, keeping your site secure and organized.

Stay informed and responsive on the go with Slack notifications‚Äîno matter where you are.

sections.installation:
1. Go to your Dashboard
  2. Opt-in to Plugins > Add New
  3. Search forWP Activity Notifier
  4. Click Install and Activate

Once you activate the plugin, it will be redirect to the plugin added pages add your plugin and hit save. Then simply visit setting page to set slack channel webhook and review interval. That‚Äôs it! You‚Äôre ready to get all review/support notification.
sections.faq:
How quickly can I get started?

You can get started within a few minutes. Activate the plugin, connect your webhok and set interval then set the plugin slug and you‚Äôre ready.

How do I set up the Slack notifications?

You need to enter your Slack webhook URL in the plugin settings panel. Instructions for generating the webhook URL are provided in the settings panel.

Can I give specific time for notification?

Yes of course, you can specify any time when you want the notification to appear.

Will this plugin slow down my website?

No, this plugin has been designed to have minimal impact on website performance.

Is this plugin compatible with all modern browsers?

Yes, you can use this plugin in all modern browsers (Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Edge, etc) without any issue.

Do I need to know any programming language for using this plugin?

No.WP Activity Notifier is an easy-to-use plugin and you can use it without any programming knowledge.

What happens if I don’t set up the Slack notifications?

You will not receive any notifications on Slack, but the plugin will still function normally.
